data.name: The Forest Quartet Demo
data.detailed_description:
"The quartet has, for the past 2 years, lived in the woods and thus created their first record. I know not how you feel dear listener, but I can almost taste the forest in their music".

The Forest Quartet is a 3D narrative puzzler about a gone, but not forgotten, lead singer. Travel through 3 acts unique to the members of her band for a final farewell concert. Face their emotions, solve puzzles and fight the corruption plaguing their souls.

VOICE POWER

Use the power of your voice, combined with other musical structures to restore the balance. Find and activate the generators of encouragement to motivate the artists.

A FINE TUNED ENVIRONMENT

The environments and interactions all have musical feedback fine-tuned to the gameplay, showing the path to solve the musicians health.

DARKNESS, FEAR AND ANGER

Each band memeber deals with their emotions differently. Travel through their psyches, all unique to their state of mind.

data.short_description: The Forest Quartet is a 3D narrative puzzler about a gone, but not forgotten, lead singer. Travel through 3 acts unique to the members of her band for a final farewell concert. Face their emotions, solve puzzles and fight the corruption plaguing their souls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670T @2.3 GHz, AMD FX 8370E @3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 480, Nvidia GeForce GTX 580M, AMD Radeon R7-265 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 @3.3 GHz, AMD FX 6120 @3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 Ti, Nvidia GeForce GT 750M, Radeon HD5850 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
